name: FindDark
description:
Become the main character in a movie-like content and achieve your purpose.
This game is not difficult, just walk around in the game and experience and enjoy what is happening. It's not terribly frightening and nothing difficult. Just for the story to take place in the game you'll have to play.

There is a demo

It would be good to play the trial version in advance to see what kind of game the original version is. Get to know the mood of the gameplay and see if you can enjoy it enough

The way of the game

The way the game progresses is to escape from where you are and move on to the next level. Enjoy what happens when you take actions to escape from there.
Supernatural things and characters are featured in this game. Sometimes it can be a surprise. Be aware of this.

The game is divided into Part 1 and Part 2. Part 2 is scheduled to be released as dlc in the future.

    [Full support for xbox controllers will be updated two weeks after the game is released.]
